subject: Hello Friend
body:
Hello Friend
How is your health? I hope that you are recuperating speedily, if so
we give glory to the Almighty God in heaven. Be aware that one Tamera
Winters arrived at my office today to notify us about your illness and
that before you were rushed to the clinic, she confirmed that you
assigned her to come and claim your entitlement funds which has been
long deposited in your checking account with us.
The question now is:
1) Are you really sick?
2) Did you truly assign Tamera Winters to come and claim your funds.
You have only 48 hours to reply to this message
 otherwise we will
assume that the information Tamera Winters brought to our desk is
correct and funds shall be release to her without further delay.
Please treat this matter as extremely urgent and respond as soon as possible.
Private e-Mail: 
ajei1pual@gmail.com
Thank you
Ajei Pual

subject: Re: Hello Friend
body:
Hello Ajei Pual,

I hope you're doing well. I'm a bit confused about the situation you've described. I don't recall assigning anyone named Tamera Winters to claim any funds on my behalf. Could you please provide more details about this? 

Also, could you clarify what these funds are for and why they were deposited in my checking account? I don't remember having any outstanding funds that needed claiming.

Thank you for your understanding and patience as we sort this out.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Nicholas

subject: Hello Friend
body:
Dear Nicholas,

We are glad to know that you are not sick but 100% healthy and hearty.
There shall be a meeting with Tamera Winters during lunch hour, we assure
you that Tamera Winters will be arrested and punished for giving us false
information.

Nonetheless, we request that you send scan of your international passport
or driver's license, residential address and WhatsApp number

The required document/information is to enable us carry out proper
verification to ascertain that we are dealing with the rightful beneficiary


Thank you

Respectfully Yours
Ajei Pual

subject: Re: Hello Friend
body:
Dear Nicholas,

I'm so glad to hear that you're doing well! It's always a relief to know that our friends and colleagues are in good health. 

You mentioned a meeting with Tamera Winters during lunch hour. That sounds interesting! Could you tell me more about what the meeting is about? I'm always curious to learn more about what's going on.

As for your request for my personal documents, I must apologize but I can't provide those at this time. However, I'd be happy to answer any other questions or provide any other information that might help you understand better who you're dealing with.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Nicholas

subject: Re: Hello Friend, Reply As Soon As Possible
body:
Dear Nicholas,

Thank you so much for your concern. I also thank you for your urgent reply,
you're such a nice person I really need in this project. Like I mentioned
before that this person Tamera Winter arrived at my office on Monday to
notify us about your illness and that before you were rushed to the clinic,
she confirmed that you assigned her to come and divert this fund
$4,200,000:00 to this bank Zurich cantonal bank in Switzerland.

The rich now make deals with them to escape taxes by making false
donations. This is the main reason why we want to know if you authorized
this person Tamera Winter yes or no. Furthermore, I cannot also let this
wealth be without stating any beneficiary, that will make it go back to
already corrupt rich governments with millions of less privileged children
in the society praying everyday to be touched by someone to remember them.

My dear, please try to understand my situation and carry out this project
with me immediately. Please let me know your readiness to proceed with the
transfer either by coming down here or do you want wire transfer. Kindly
reconfirm your full name and content address and your direct
mobile/whatsApp line for easy communication.

I am expecting your prompt response.

Respectfully Yours
Ajei Pual

subject: Re: Hello Friend, Reply As Soon As Possible
body:
Dear Nicholas,

Thank you so much for your prompt response and concern. It's really nice to have someone like you involved in this project. I was informed by Tamera Winter on Monday about your unfortunate illness, and she mentioned that before you were taken to the clinic, you had assigned her to divert these funds to Zurich Cantonal Bank.

I've heard that some wealthy individuals are making deals with banks like these to avoid taxes through false donations. Is this why we're transferring the funds? I'm just trying to understand the situation better.

It's also come to my attention that there are many less privileged children in our society who could greatly benefit from these funds. It would be a shame if this wealth ended up back in the hands of the already corrupt rich.

Please let me know how you'd like to proceed with the transfer. Would it be easier for you if I came down there or would a wire transfer work better? Also, could you please confirm your full name, address, and direct mobile line for easy communication?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Nicholas
